dmca.title: Blog Posts DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google

works.description:
I write a number of travel blog entries on my website www.fourjandals.com which has been copied and pasted on to the offending website.
An example of my blog content is the following sentence which can be viewed at the following URL in the next box: "That is if you decide to believe in the 2012 Mayan prophecy that was recorded 5,125 years ago basically outlining that on the 21 December 2012 it is the end of civilization as we know it."
